Package csc1035.project2

Class RoomBooking

java.lang.Object
csc1035.project2.RoomBooking
public class RoomBooking
extends java.lang.Object
RoomBooking provides a simple interface to perform operations around rooms and bookings.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • menu

      public static void menu()
      Provides user with a simple menu.

    • booking

      public static void booking()
      Gets user input to make a booking, puts rooms through filters to find those available. If a room is available then user can book one, the booking is saved to the database.

    • getRooms

      public static java.util.List<Room> getRooms()
      This is a method that gets all rooms and puts them in a list.
      Returns:
      list of all rooms in the database.

    • getBookings

      public static java.util.List<Booking> getBookings()
      This is a method that gets all bookings and puts them in a list.
      Returns:
      list of all bookings in the database.

    • listRooms

      public static void listRooms​(java.util.List<Room> rooms)
      This is a method for outputting a given list of rooms.
      Parameters:
      rooms - list of rooms to be output.

    • cancel

      public static void cancel()
      This is a method that allows the user to cancel their booking by entering the booking ID of the booking that they want to cancel.

    • typeFilter

      public static java.util.List<Room> typeFilter​(java.util.List<Room> rooms, java.lang.String type)
      Takes a list of rooms and removes any not of the correct type.
      Parameters:
      rooms - list of room objects.
      type - the type of room the user is looking for.
      Returns:
      list of rooms that have the correct type.

    • sizeFilter

      public static java.util.List<Room> sizeFilter​(java.util.List<Room> rooms, int groupSize, boolean socialDistancing)
      Takes a list of rooms and removes all the ones which are not big enough.
      Parameters:
      rooms - list of room objects.
      groupSize - the number of people to use the room.
      socialDistancing - is the booking under social distance conditions.
      Returns:
      list of rooms that can fit the number of people.

    • dateFilter

      public static java.util.List<Booking> dateFilter​(java.util.List<Booking> bookings, java.util.Calendar date)
      Takes a list of bookings and removes all with a date other than the one we are booking for.
      Parameters:
      bookings - lit of booking objects.
      date - the date the user wants to book for.
      Returns:
      list of bookings all on the desired date.

    • timeFilter

      public static java.util.List<Room> timeFilter​(java.util.List<Room> rooms, java.util.List<Booking> bookings, java.util.Calendar ourStartTime, int duration, java.lang.String id)
      Looks at all the bookings and checks if a room is booked all ready for when the user wants.
      Parameters:
      rooms - list of room objects.
      bookings - list of booking objects.
      ourStartTime - the start time of the users booking.
      duration - how long the users booking is going to last.
      id - the ID of the person the booking is for.
      Returns:
      list of rooms that are available at that time.

    • updateRoom

      public static void updateRoom()
      Takes a room and a field, and updates it with given data.

    • chooseRoom

      public static java.lang.String chooseRoom​(java.util.List<Room> rooms)
      Choose a room from a given list.
      Parameters:
      rooms - list o room objects to choose from.
      Returns:
      the primary key of the chosen room.

    • chooseField

      public static java.lang.String chooseField()
      The user has to choose the field they wish to update.
      Returns:
      the field the user has chosen.

    • validID

      public static boolean validID​(java.lang.String roomNumber, java.util.List<Room> rooms)
      Checks a given ID is in a list of rooms.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - ID to check exists.
      rooms - list of rooms to check against.
      Returns:
      boolean value of if the ID exists in the given list.

    • confirmation

      public static void confirmation()
      This is a method that returns the booking confirmation of the booking that the user made. It prints out some of the important information on the booking confirmation.

    • timetable

      public static void timetable()
      This method produces the timetable for a room.
